resources: Wa Revamp An Xposed module to customize your WhatsApp. WhatsApp Version: Module Version: Module Status: Disable Enable Author: I\'ts Madruga Telegram Channgel: @warevampmodule Update Available Click for more information. Update Message Deleted Privacy Features Customization Home Screen • Chat Screen General WhatsApp Theme • Clean Database Privacy Anti-Delete Options • View Once • Hide Receipt Home Screen Separate Groups • Toolbar Settings" Conversation Customize your chat screen." Media Settings Videos in HD • Imagens in HD" Anti-Delete Options Anti-Delete Messages Messages will not be deleted for you. Anti-Delete Status Statuses will not be deleted for you. Send videos in HD quality Send videos in HD quality. Send images in HD quality Send images in HD quality. Reboot WhatsApp New WhatsApp theme When activated, it changes the color and icon theme to the new WhatsApp theme. Disable View Once When active, it allows you to open view-once messages as many times as you want. DND Mode When Do Not Disturb mode is on, you will be unable to send or receive messages. Hide Receipt Don\'t tell the users you\'ve received the messages. Separate groups Separate your chats by: groups, private chats, status, calls, communities. New Context Menu UI The new iOS-style message context menu will be enabled. Clean MsgStore Database Delete your messages, statuses and calls. Clean Axolotl Database Request code and leave messages on hold. Clean Wa Database Removes slowdowns when sending messages and synchronizes contacts. Clean Sticker Database Deletes all saved stickers. Clean Database Clean messages • Clean Stickers • Sync Contacts Do you want to continue?\n\nThis action is irreversible. Database deleted successfully. About App Disable Pinned Chats Limit Disable limit of 3 pinned chats. Hide Archived Chats Hide archived chats, to access hold on the \"WhatsApp\" title in the header on Home Screen. Hide Blue Ticks View messages and statuses on the chat screen without users knowing. Quality Options Download Options Download Status Create a button to download people\'s statuses. Download View Once Create a view once download button. Remove FLAG_SECURE from Window This function removes the FLAG_SECURE from app windows, allowing unrestricted screenshot and screen recording capabilities. Hide Recording Audio When active, the person cannot see that you are recording audio. Hide Typing When active, the person cannot see that you are typing. Freeze last seen When it\'is enabled, you\'ll don\'t see any presence updates from other users, like typing, recording, online.
